nodes.text: Edra Kothe was a female Human who lived on the planet Dantooine in the decades before the beginning of the Great Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Married to Neven Kothe, Edra and her husband had a Force-sensitive son named Ardun who was born in 3696 BBY, and Ardun was recruited into the Jedi Order during his childhood. Due to fragmentary records, Imperial Intelligence was unable to determine whether Edra and Neven had fled to the Core Worlds when the Great Galactic War began.
Edra Kothe was first mentioned in the Codex entry for Ardun Kothe in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
